me wanawita bhikshun wahansela 12 namak athuluwa 44 denekuge shishya bhawaya ath hituwa athi bawath, mita masa kihipayakata ihatha di apawath wu ke. aar. sarananda (ee/aar 63463) himiyange nama da shishya bhawaya athhitawu shishya nam layisthuwe athulathwa athi bawath unwahanse penwa dunneya. 2010.11.26 wana dina dahawal udghoshanayak pawathwima hethu kota gena shishyayanta thama adahas pa්rakasha kirime ayithiya ha ekathu wime ayithiya mulumaninma ahosikara dama athi bawath, jayawardhanapura sarasawiye upakulapathi en.el.ee. karunarathna mahatha wisin edina sarasawiya kittuwakawath nositi sisunge pawa shishyabhawayaahosi kara athi bawath shasthrapita shishya sangamaye lekam,kambaurupitiye gnyanissara himiyan sandahan karayi.
